com.tambapps.gmage

Class UndoRedoGmage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tambapps.gmage.Gmage
      • com.tambapps.gmage.UndoRedoGmage

  • public class UndoRedoGmage
extends Gmage
    Undo/Redo Gmage This Gmage listens to all operations modifying itself to keep track of any change, allowing to undo/redo an operation

    • Method Summary

      Returns a copy of this gmage

      Returns the history of this gmage

      Swap all pixel along the Y axis at the horizontal center of the gmage.

      Swap all pixel along the X axis at the vertical center of the gmage.

      Modify the i-th pixel (1-D)

      boolean redo()
      Redo the last undone operation if any
      void runOperation(Consumer<Gmage> gmageConsumer)
      Allow to perform multiple modifications to this UndoRedoGmage and get only one change containing all the actions performed in the history Note that nested calls of this functions are not handled

      copy this gmage into the one passed in parameter.

        public void runOperation(Consumer<Gmage> gmageConsumer)

        public void putAt(List<Number> xy,
                  Color value)
        Description copied from class: Gmage
        Modify the pixel at coordinates (xy[0], xy[1]). A list was used for xy coordinates to make this method groovy friendly => gmage[x,y] = 0xffffff
        Overrides:

        Parameters:
        xy - a list of two elements: x and y coordinates
        value - the color to put at this coordinate
